alert.note: Alert for Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 6:13AM AKST until February 11 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of the central Inner Channels, the northern Inner Channels, and the eastern Gulf Coast including Juneau, Hoonah, Gustavus, Tenakee Springs, Pelican, and Elfin Cove. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Snow will be wet and heavy in weight and could be difficult to manage. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as snow before changing to all rain Friday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Glacier Bay; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
